verses.text: Moreover the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* time, while he was yet shut \w up|strong="H6113"\w* in the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* of the \w prison|strong="H4307"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* the \w maker|strong="H6213"\w* thereof, the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* that \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* it, to \w establish|strong="H3559"\w* it; the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*;  +  r 33.2  t the \+nd LORD\+nd* is: or, \+nd JEHOVAH\+nd*, etc *

\w Call|strong="H7121"\w* unto me, and I will \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* thee, and \w shew|strong="H5046"\w* thee \w great|strong="H1419"\w* and mighty \w things|strong="H1219"\w*, which thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* not.\f + \fr 33.3 \ft mighty: or, hidden\f*

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, concerning the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of this \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and concerning the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, which are thrown \w down|strong="H5422"\w* by the \w mounts|strong="H5550"\w*, and by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*;

They \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* with the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, but \add it is\add* to \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* them with the dead \w bodies|strong="H6297"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*, whom I have \w slain|strong="H5221"\w* in mine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* and in my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w*, and for all whose \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* I have \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* from this \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

Behold, I will \w bring|strong="H5927"\w* it \w health|strong="H0724"\w* and \w cure|strong="H4832"\w*, and I will \w cure|strong="H7495"\w* them, and will \w reveal|strong="H1540"\w* unto them the \w abundance|strong="H6283"\w* of \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* and \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*.

And I will cause the \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and the \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, and will \w build|strong="H1129"\w* them, as at the \w first|strong="H7223"\w*.

And I will \w cleanse|strong="H2891"\w* them from all their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, whereby they have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against me; and I will \w pardon|strong="H5545"\w* all their \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*, whereby they have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, and whereby they have \w transgressed|strong="H6586"\w* against me.

¶ And it shall be to me a \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of \w joy|strong="H8342"\w*, a \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* and an \w honour|strong="H8597"\w* before all the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, which shall \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* all the \w good|strong="H2896"\w* that I \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto them: and they shall \w fear|strong="H6342"\w* and \w tremble|strong="H7264"\w* for all the \w goodness|strong="H2896"\w* and for all the \w prosperity|strong="H7965"\w* that I \w procure|strong="H6213"\w* unto it.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; Again there shall be \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* in this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, which ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \add shall be\add* \w desolate|strong="H2720"\w* without \w man|strong="H0120"\w* and without \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, \add even\add* in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and in the \w streets|strong="H2351"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, that are \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*, without \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, and without \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w*, and without \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*,

The \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w joy|strong="H8342"\w*, and the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w*, the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w bridegroom|strong="H2860"\w*, and the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w bride|strong="H3618"\w*, the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of them that shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Praise|strong="H3034"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*; for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: \add and\add* of them that shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* the sacrifice of \w praise|strong="H8426"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*. For I will cause to \w return|strong="H7725"\w* the \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, as at the \w first|strong="H7223"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; Again in this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, which is \w desolate|strong="H2720"\w* without \w man|strong="H0120"\w* and without \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*, and in all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* thereof, shall be an \w habitation|strong="H5116"\w* of \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* causing \add their\add* \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* to lie \w down|strong="H7257"\w*.

In the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w vale|strong="H8219"\w*, and in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w south|strong="H5045"\w*, and in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, and in the places \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, shall the \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* pass \w again|strong="H5674"\w* under the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of him that \w telleth|strong="H4487"\w* \add them\add*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Behold, the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that I will \w perform|strong="H6965"\w* that \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* which I have \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

¶ In those \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, and at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, will I cause the \w Branch|strong="H6780"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* to grow \w up|strong="H6779"\w* unto \w David|strong="H1732"\w*; and he shall \w execute|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* and \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

In those \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shall \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* be \w saved|strong="H3467"\w*, and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* shall \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w safely|strong="H0983"\w*: and this \add is the name\add* wherewith she shall be \w called|strong="H7121"\w*, The \nd LORD\nd* our \w righteousness|strong="H3072"\w*.\f + \fr 33.16 \ft The \+nd LORD\+nd*…: Heb. Jehovah-tsidkenu\f*

¶ For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; \w David|strong="H1732"\w* shall \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w want|strong="H3772"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* upon the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*;\f + \fr 33.17 \ft David…: Heb. There shall not be cut off from David\f*

Neither shall the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w want|strong="H3772"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me to \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*, and to \w kindle|strong="H6999"\w* meat \w offerings|strong="H4503"\w*, and to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* \w continually|strong="H3117"\w*.
¶ And the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; If ye can \w break|strong="H6565"\w* my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, and that there should not be \w day|strong="H3119"\w* and \w night|strong="H3915"\w* in their \w season|strong="H6256"\w*;

\add Then\add* may also my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* be \w broken|strong="H6565"\w* with \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, that he should not have a \w son|strong="H1121"\w* to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* upon his \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*; and with the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, my \w ministers|strong="H8334"\w*.

As the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* cannot be \w numbered|strong="H5608"\w*, neither the \w sand|strong="H2344"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w measured|strong="H4058"\w*: so will I \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* that \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* unto me.
Moreover the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came to \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Considerest|strong="H7200"\w* thou not what this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w families|strong="H4940"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w*, he hath even cast them \w off|strong="H3988"\w*? thus they have \w despised|strong="H5006"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, that they should be no more a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; If my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \add be\add* not with \w day|strong="H3119"\w* and \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \add and if\add* I have not \w appointed|strong="H7760"\w* the \w ordinances|strong="H2708"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* and \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*;

\w Then|strong="H1571"\w* will I cast \w away|strong="H3988"\w* the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \add so\add* that I will not \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \add any\add* of his \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \add to be\add* \w rulers|strong="H4910"\w* over the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*, \w Isaac|strong="H3446"\w*, and \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*: for I will cause their \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w* to \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, and have \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* on them.
